node U.from sentence: Our results showed that when node U is shared , as it is called ' universal ' , it learns information interaction between the question and passage , and when it is not shared , the performance slightly degraded .

BiLSTM.from sentence: Results show that the performance dropped slightly , suggesting sharing BiLSTM is an effective method to improve the quality of the encoder .

plausible answer pointer.from sentence: After removing the plausible answer pointer , the performance also dropped , indicating the plausible answers are useful to improve the model even though they are incorrect .

performance.from sentence: After removing the answer verifier , the performance dropped greatly , indicating it is vital for our model .

second block ( multi - level attention ).from sentence: In the second block ( multi - level attention ) of the U - Net , we do not split the output of the encoded presentation and let it pass through a self - attention layer .
